items.title: Never lose your wallet again with the KeySmart SmartCard Lite, now down as low as $16 each
items.summary:
Apple AirTags promised to make keeping track of everything easier. I thought they would be the ultimate high tech tracker. But then they launched and … I’m disappointed. They’re clunky, expensive, and only last a few months. While they’re great for suitcases, bags, and even keys (when attached to a keyring). But when it comes to keeping track of your cards, wallet, and badges, they leave a lot to be desired. The spherical devices don’t fit inside a phone case, a stylish wallet, or in your jean pockets. But you don’t have to worry about unsightly bulging trackers anymore. Enter: the KeySmart SmartCard Lite.

more…

Reports have been circulating online claiming that recent Windows 11 updates, specifically KB5063878 and KB5062660, were causing SSD failures. items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – Up to $700 off gaming monitors, fresh lows on Copilot+ PCs, and more Labor Day deals
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. Amazon, Best Buy, and a bunch of other retailers kicked off their Labor Day sale this week, offering huge savings on battlestation gear, Copilot+ PC, and more. From huge savings on portable SSDs and laptops at Best Buy to notable markdowns on gaming peripherals like keyboard, gamepad, and more at Amazon, we tracked a bunch of solid deals this week that are still live and waiting for you below in this week’s Battlestation Weekly, so hit the jump for all the details.

items.title: Electrified Weekly – Labor Day sales from Lectric, Aventon, EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, Autel, Schumacher, and much more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. We’ve got a jam-packed edition for you to browse and shop through during this Labor Day weekend, with the most notable EV deals being from Lectric’s holiday sale, which is not only seeing increased bundles on various e-bikes (many seeing their largest to date), but it also includes the preorder launch on the brand’s new Long-Range XP Trike2 750. Alongside the many other e-bike deals, we also spotted new and returning low prices on EV chargers and charging stations from Schumacher and Autel.

Of course, we’ve got the final days of various power station sales from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, and more that you won’t want to waste time considering, as there is no telling if these sales will be extended or prices raised come Monday. You’ll also find plenty of other devices, appliances, tools, and more benefitting from discounts – just head below and shop to your heart’s content!
